RETURNDATA.OVERVIEW_CONTENT: List of days off In the company like vacations, weekends etc……

ITEM_DATA.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: To add a day off use this button as shown in the picture, when you press on this button a form of Day Off details will appear enter the Day Off type and the description then press on Add button , the Day off then will be added to the table.
To delete a day off select it from the table by checking on the check box of it then press on delete button.
To edit a day off select it from the table by clicking on the day off link, you will find the details of the day off appears in the form , make your changes you want then press on update button.
